sys_dns/id.description: The unique identifier that is associated with the DNS A record of the server. The unique identifier is assigned by the DNS provider when you create a dynamic DNS A record. This ID is used to update the associated A record with the private IP address of the server when this recipe is run. If you are using DNS Made Easy as your DNS provider, a 7-digit number is used (e.g., 4403234). If you are using Cloud DNS, provide both Domain ID and Record ID (e.g., DomainID:A-RecordID)

sys_dns_public/tags.description: DNS Tag space to query for public ips to set on multiple records

recipes.sys_dns_public::do_set_public: Sets the DNS Record to the Public IP
